title: Replace logo with user-provided Archak image

requirements.text: Replace the existing generated logo/emblem in the Navigation bar and Footer with the user-provided 'ARCHAK' logo image. Save the uploaded image as a static asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/logo.dim_300x120.png and update the src references in Navigation.tsx and Footer.tsx to point to this new file.
acceptanceCriteria: The new 'ARCHAK' logo (green bubble-text wordmark on white background) is displayed in the navigation bar in place of the old generated logo.
The same new logo is displayed in the footer wherever the logo was previously shown.
The logo image file is stored at frontend/public/assets/generated/logo.dim_300x120.png.
No broken image references remain for the old logo.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/hooks/ or frontend/src/components/ui.
Do not alter any other section or design system; only the logo image references should change.
nonGoals: Redesigning the navigation bar or footer layout.
Changing the color theme or typography.

required: Green bubble-text wordmark reading 'ARCHAK' on a transparent/white background, matching the uploaded IMG_5709.jpeg style (logo.dim_300x120.png)
